definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pass on, advance (Ar. (9dw) 9ada0 pass by, also run = Eth. 9adawa: pass by; Aram. [[עדי]] go along, go by (oft. for Heb. [[עָבַר]], Aph. remove; Syr. 9do0 pass by, come, c. 9al fall upon);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[עָדָה]] Job 28:8 the fierce lion hath not advanced upon it (sc. the way).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מַעֲדֶה בֶּגֶד]] Pr 25:20 removing a garment (cf. 38:19 Targum, Jon 3:6 Heb. and Targum).
